message: I signed up for the 14 day free trial yestersay for the $9.99 version which includes portable downloading and streaming after hearing Leo talk about how it is higher quality than Rdio.  So far I like it but I'm not sure how much time I will have to listen with all the podcasts and streaming programming.
One common problem with  these services is that many of the classic oldies are re recordings.  I have a lot of the originals in my collection anyway
The Rdio mobile app is pretty buggy. That's all I can say right now
I was pretty pleased with the MOG mobile application.  Haven't used it alot

One thing I noticed about MOG is they seem to be pretty clueless about music details of older music.  They seem to use whatever release date they have for the CD for the music's release date and the info is simply lifted from AMG..  Also, I searched for "Dream Weaver" by Gary Wright.  The first result was a re recording even though they had the original album.  Hopefully it will get better with time.
